description: Build is the Schema for the builds API.

apiVersion.description:
APIVersion defines the versioned schema of this representation of an object.
Servers should convert recognized schemas to the latest internal value, and
may reject unrecognized values.
More info: https://git.k8s.io/community/contributors/devel/sig-architecture/api-conventions.md#resources

kind.description:
Kind is a string value representing the REST resource this object represents.
Servers may infer this from the endpoint the client submits requests to.
Cannot be updated.
In CamelCase.
More info: https://git.k8s.io/community/contributors/devel/sig-architecture/api-conventions.md#types-kinds

spec.description:
BuildSpec defines the list of tasks to be execute for a Build. From Camel K version 2, it would be more appropriate
to think it as pipeline.

configuration.description:
The configuration that should be used to perform the Build.
Deprecated: no longer in use in Camel K 2 - maintained for backward compatibility

annotations.description: Annotation to use for the builder pod. Only used for `pod` strategy

limitCPU.description: The maximum amount of CPU required. Only used for `pod` strategy

limitMemory.description: The maximum amount of memory required. Only used for `pod` strategy

nodeSelector.description: The node selector for the builder pod. Only used for `pod` strategy

operatorNamespace.description: The namespace where to run the builder Pod (must be the same of the operator in charge of this Build reconciliation).

orderStrategy.description: the build order strategy to adopt

platforms.description: The list of platforms used in order to build a container image.

requestCPU.description: The minimum amount of CPU required. Only used for `pod` strategy

requestMemory.description: The minimum amount of memory required. Only used for `pod` strategy

toolImage.description: The container image to be used to run the build.

maxRunningBuilds.description:
the maximum amount of parallel running builds started by this operator instance
Deprecated: no longer in use in Camel K 2 - maintained for backward compatibility

operatorNamespace.description:
The namespace where to run the builder Pod (must be the same of the operator in charge of this Build reconciliation).
Deprecated: no longer in use in Camel K 2 - maintained for backward compatibility

tasks.description: The sequence of tasks (pipeline) to be performed.

items.description: Task represents the abstract task. Only one of the task should be configured to represent the specific task chosen.

buildah.description:
a BuildahTask, for Buildah strategy
Deprecated: use jib or a custom publishing strategy instead

commit.description: the git commit (full SHA) to check out

tag.description: the git tag to check out

maven.description: the configuration required by Maven for the application build phase

caSecrets.description:
The Secrets name and key, containing the CA certificate(s) used to connect
to remote Maven repositories.
It can contain X.509 certificates, and PKCS#7 formatted certificate chains.
A JKS formatted keystore is automatically created to store the CA certificate(s),
and configured to be used as a trusted certificate(s) by the Maven commands.
Note that the root CA certificates are also imported into the created keystore.

items.description: SecretKeySelector selects a key of a Secret.

key.description: The key of the secret to select from.  Must be a valid secret key.

name.description:
Name of the referent.
This field is effectively required, but due to backwards compatibility is
allowed to be empty. Instances of this type with an empty value here are
almost certainly wrong.
More info: https://kubernetes.io/docs/concepts/overview/working-with-objects/names/#names

optional.description: Specify whether the Secret or its key must be defined

cliOptions.description:
The CLI options that are appended to the list of arguments for Maven commands,
e.g., `-V,--no-transfer-progress,-Dstyle.color=never`.
See https://maven.apache.org/ref/3.8.4/maven-embedder/cli.html.

items.description: MavenArtifact defines a GAV (Group:Artifact:Type:Version:Classifier) Maven artifact.

localRepository.description: The path of the local Maven repository.

profiles.description:
A reference to the ConfigMap or Secret key that contains
the Maven profile.

items.description: ValueSource --.

items.description: Repository defines a Maven repository.

name.description: name of the repository

checksumPolicy.description:
When Maven deploys files to the repository, it also deploys corresponding checksum files.
Your options are to `ignore`, `fail`, or `warn` on missing or incorrect checksums.

enabled.description: is the policy activated or not

updatePolicy.description:
This element specifies how often updates should attempt to occur.
Maven will compare the local POM's timestamp (stored in a repository's maven-metadata file) to the remote.
The choices are: `always`, `daily` (default), `interval:X` (where X is an integer in minutes) or `never`

additionalProperties.description:
Capability is a particular feature which requires a well known set of dependencies and other properties
which are specified in the runtime catalog.

buildTimeProperties.description: Set of required Camel build time properties

items.description: CamelProperty represents a Camel property that may end up in an application.properties file.

dependencies.description: list of dependencies needed to run the application

provider.description: Camel main application provider, ie, Camel Quarkus

sources.description: the sources to add at build time

items.description: SourceSpec defines the configuration for one or more routes to be executed in a certain Camel DSL language.

compression.description: if the content is compressed (base64 encrypted)

contentKey.description: the confimap key holding the source content

contentRef.description: the confimap reference holding the source content

contentType.description: the content type (tipically text or binary)

from-kamelet.description: True if the spec is generated from a Kamelet

interceptors.description:
Interceptors are optional identifiers the org.apache.camel.k.RoutesLoader
uses to pre/post process sources
Deprecated: no longer in use.

language.description: specify which is the language (Camel DSL) used to interpret this source code

loader.description:
Loader is an optional id of the org.apache.camel.k.RoutesLoader that will
interpret this source at runtime

name.description: the name of the specification

path.description: the path where the file is stored

property-names.description: List of property names defined in the source (e.g. if type is "template")

type.description: Type defines the kind of source described by this object

steps.description: the list of steps to execute (see pkg/builder/)

custom.description: User customizable task execution. These are executed after the build and before the package task.

command.description:
the command to execute
Deprecated: use ContainerCommands

caSecrets.description:
The Secrets name and key, containing the CA certificate(s) used to connect
to remote Maven repositories.
It can contain X.509 certificates, and PKCS#7 formatted certificate chains.
A JKS formatted keystore is automatically created to store the CA certificate(s),
and configured to be used as a trusted certificate(s) by the Maven commands.
Note that the root CA certificates are also imported into the created keystore.

requestMemory.description: The minimum amount of memory required. Only used for `pod` strategy

toolImage.description: The container image to be used to run the build.

contextDir.description: can be useful to share info with other tasks

name.description: name of the task

registry.description: where to publish the final image

ca.description: the configmap which stores the Certificate Authority

insecure.description: if the container registry is insecure (ie, http only)

secret.description: the secret where credentials are stored

timeout.description:
Timeout defines the Build maximum execution duration.
The Build deadline is set to the Build start time plus the Timeout duration.
If the Build deadline is exceeded, the Build context is canceled,
and its phase set to BuildPhaseFailed.

toolImage.description:
The container image to be used to run the build.
Deprecated: no longer in use in Camel K 2 - maintained for backward compatibility

status.description: BuildStatus defines the observed state of Build.

artifacts.description: a list of artifacts contained in the build

items.description: Artifact represents a materialized artifact (a jar dependency or in general a file used by the build).

id.description: the identification (GAV for maven dependencies or file name for other file types)

location.description: where it is located in the builder `Pod`

target.description: the expected location in the runtime

baseImage.description: the base image used for this build

conditions.description: a list of conditions occurred during the build

items.description: BuildCondition describes the state of a resource at a certain point.

lastTransitionTime.description: Last time the condition transitioned from one status to another.

lastUpdateTime.description: The last time this condition was updated.

message.description: A human-readable message indicating details about the transition.

reason.description: The reason for the condition's last transition.

status.description: Status of the condition, one of True, False, Unknown.

duration.description:
how long it took for the build
Change to Duration / ISO 8601 when CRD uses OpenAPI spec v3
https://github.com/OAI/OpenAPI-Specification/issues/845

failure.description: the reason of the failure (if any)

reason.description: a short text specifying the reason

recovery.description: the recovery attempted for this failure

time.description: the time when the failure has happened

observedGeneration.description: ObservedGeneration is the most recent generation observed for this Build.

rootImage.description: root image (the first image from which the incremental image has started)
